== Upgrade Your Ubuntu GNOME ==
<<BR>>

|-

<<BR>>
=== Back Up ===
<<BR>>
Back up your data first. Follow this <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BackupYourSystem | tutorial for backing up data]]</nowiki>, or just download <nowiki>[[http://clonezilla.org/downloads.php | Clonezilla]]</nowiki> and create an image of your hard drive/system partition.

<<BR>>
=== Upgrade ===
<<BR>>
If you were using the gnome3-team/gnome3-staging PPA, run the following before upgrading:
<pre>
sudo ppa-purge ppa:gnome3-team/gnome3-staging
sudo ppa-purge ppa:gnome3-team/gnome3
sudo apt install ubuntu-gnome-desktop^
</pre>
<<BR>>

The included GUI update manager will offer you the latest release of Ubuntu GNOME. Access this via the terminal:

<pre>
update-manager -c
</pre>
<<BR>>

Alternatively, run the following command:

<pre>
sudo do-release-upgrade
</pre>

<<BR>>
=== Troubleshooting ===
<<BR>>
** If you get the message ''No new release found'', <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/125392/why-is-no-new-release-found-when-upgrading-from-a-lts-to-the-next | see this post]]</nowiki>
